resources.string: Read the below guidelines, to know more about how the functionalities of the app,

string.name: help_1
string.i: Grant Overlay and Read Storage Permission so that Video Player can run on screen, along with other apps.

string.name: help_2
string.i: Tap on the Video Player, to PLAY/PAUSE the video.

string.name: help_3
string.i: Double tap on the Video Player to open the Playlist.

string.name: help_4
string.i: Clear whole Playlist from the menu.
